config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The MAX_HEIGHT configuration option is used to limit the height of an image in the code. If the image's height exceeds the specified MAX_HEIGHT value, the code will resize the image to fit within the specified height.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the MAX_HEIGHT configuration depends on the input images and their respective heights. If an input image has a height greater than the specified MAX_HEIGHT value, the configuration will be triggered to resize the image.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the MAX_HEIGHT configuration option is that it ensures that images with heights exceeding the specified value are resized to fit within the specified height limit. This helps in maintaining consistency in image sizes and preventing oversized images from affecting the layout of the document.
